scenario_text.value:
Hmm, I thought this might be it, but it
didn’t move or anything when I punched it.

Doesn’t it hurt your hand to punch rock like
that?

Oh, don’t worry about that. My hands are
tough.

But you’re bleeding. That looks like it would
really hurt.

You’re right! We should treat that hand right
away!
Only I don’t know how. Should I call for Aoi?

If you tell Aoi, she’ll make a whole big
thing out of it. Just keep quiet, okay?

Yeah, I bet she’d really let you have it!
Probably yell at you for bein’ so reckless.

This doesn’t even count as an injury, okay?
So don’t mention it to the others.
